main_definition: In the context of games, activities or events, 'played' means to have participated in or engaged with them.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To perform an act or role as part of a game or activity
meanings_and_examples.example: 'I played the character of Romeo in our school play.'

meanings_and_examples.definition: To utilize one's time on recreational activities such as sports, games or arts
meanings_and_examples.example: 'He spent his weekend playing soccer with friends.'

meanings_and_examples.definition: To handle a situation, often referring to manipulation in a non-literal sense (idiomatic)
meanings_and_examples.example: 'They played the media to create a positive public image.'

meanings_and_examples.definition: To perform music on an instrument or as part of a musical ensemble
meanings_and_examples.example: 'She played the piano beautifully during her recital.'
